page.title: 10Trade - Winchfield Area
page.content: There are{no shops}within the block apart from those at Fleet Service Sta- tion on the M3 motorway. Most people do their local shopping at Hartley Wintney, Odiham or Fleet.{Fleet {Services}have a terrific passing trade with their various restaurants, cafes & shops but most of the trade within the block is done in the{public houses & restaurants.{The Beauclerk Arms (which does B & B) is largely pat- ronised by locals but attracts other people with its regular barbecues & is very popular at Sunday lunchtime.{The {Barley Mow,}another Courage pub, has its own cricket team & is near the Basingstoke Canal but trade is largely local.{The Plane Tree Barn}was opened in 1981 & has a restaurant in its C.17 barn, also used for wedding recep- tions, office lunches etc. Another imported barn is the public house.
